string.text: Battle Regeneration
Regeneration Values
Player Regen Amount (Percents) Per Second
What percent of total health to be regenerated every second. (Regen is applied continuously with this mod.) Default is 1%.
Companion Regen Amount (Percents) Per Second
Allied Hero Regen Amount (Percents) Per Second
Party Troop Regen Amount (Percents) Per Second
Allied Troop Regen Amount (Percents) Per Second
Enemy Hero Regen Amount (Percents) Per Second
Enemy Troop Regen Amount (Percents) Per Second
Animal Regen Amount (Percents) Per Second
Medicine Boost (Percents)
Regen is increased by this percentage for every 50 points in a human agent's medicine skill. Riders affect regen for their mounts at standard efficiency. Bonuses stack additively. Default is 50%.
Medicine Boost (Percents) For Commanders
Regen is increased by this percentage for every 50 points in a commander's medicine skills. Bonuses stack additively. Default is 25%.
XP Gain Per Full Health
How much XP is gained when an agent or its rider (if applicable) heals enough to refill its health bar from 0 to max health. XP gain is continuous. Default is 5.
XP Gain Per Full Health For Commanders
How much XP is gained when a commander heals an agent enough to refill its health bar from 0 to max health. XP gain is continuous. Default is 0.5.
Regeneration Settings
Regeneration Model
Determines the model used for regenerating health. See Nexus Mods page (https://www.nexusmods.com/mountandblade2bannerlord/mods/1432) for more details. Default is Linear.
Heal to Max Health
Enable to allow healing to max health, beyond your character's starting health in battle. Default is disabled. (Note: settings will not take effect until after (re)starting a battle.)
Debug Mode
Whether to print debug outputs to log (in C:/ProgramData/Mount and Blade II Bannerlord/logs folder). Default is false.
